results.title: Memories
results.brief_description: Memories of the early years of Moomba, particularly of the pageant and my involvement in those early years. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.

results.title: A Moomba Magic Moment
results.brief_description: It all started with my promotional photo and my girlfriend Gail Gordon, she entered me into the Moomba Quest, and the rest is history. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.

results.title: Moom
results.brief_description: Mum and I would laugh at how the Moomba festival was named after our deadly mooms. Moom refers to our bottoms. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.

results.title: Memories of a Birdman
results.brief_description: “My name is George Abel and it’s now thirty years since the idea of the Birdman Rally struck me.” A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.

results.title: Heart research
results.brief_description: David Crawford has always studied and worked in the field of science. With assistance from the Heart Foundation, it’s his work in public health research that provides the most satisfaction. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.

results.title: This is for you Richard and Cath
results.brief_description: Dedicated to her son and daughter, Lesley’s tribute to her late husband recalls the love they shared for each other. From the place where they first met, to the last place they spent time together. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ workshop in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
